projects.title: Supercards
projects.description: A next-gen fintech app focusing on seamless card management and instant transfers.
projects.longDescription: Supercards revolutionizes how users interact with their finances. We focused on a dark, neon-accented UI that feels futuristic yet accessible. Key features include real-time transaction tracking, instant peer-to-peer transfers, and smart budgeting insights.

projects.title: Cart Redesign
projects.description: Optimizing the checkout flow to reduce cart abandonment by 23%.
projects.longDescription: This redesign project aimed to simplify the checkout process for a major e-commerce retailer. By removing distractions and implementing a linear step-process, we successfully increased conversion rates and reduced cart abandonment significantly.

projects.title: Analytics Pro
projects.description: A comprehensive data visualization platform for enterprise metrics.
projects.longDescription: Analytics Pro handles millions of data points to provide real-time insights for enterprise clients. The challenge was organizing complex data sets into an intuitive, digestible dashboard without compromising on depth.
